name: Jackie DelZoppo
text: I have been ordering from Pizza Hut for years. I am always satisfied with the service and the pizza. My thought is you have the best pizza around

name: TIFFANY HAWKINS
text: First time ordering at this location. Used the drive thru to pick up my food. Food was hot, fresh, and very good. Staff was very friendly. Would recommend!

name: Shawn Cook
text: Food super hot and fresh. Delivery was on time and delivered safely. Driver very friendly.

name: linda barcik
text: Nothing different at all. Food was hot and wonderful!  Delivery on time.

name: Natalie Miller
text: Food is always fresh and tasty and my order is always ready on time! Friendly service as well!

name: Sheila Dings
text: Service was fine it was the  pizza. there was so little cheese it was hard to see it.

name: john estok
text: always fast and friendly service,also  pizza is hot and yummy!

name: John Aquila
text: The mushrooms we added onto our order werenâ€™t there.

name: Andrew Moran
text: Good food, excellent delivery

name: Carlos Carrasquillo
text: Pizza and bread sticks were burned and it said out for delivery 30 minutes and pizza arrived cold

name: Abraham Oliva
text: Good food. I recommend this location.

name: nancy hoffman
text: quick easy and friendly

name: NIck R
text: I was going to give three stars because the service was great but the pizza was so not good I couldn't find myself to give anymore than one star. Ordered a hand tossed bbq chicken pizza and the crust was gross, hardly any sauce and overall just not a pizza I would ever eat again. I'd choose frozen Jack's pizza over this anyday.

name: Ann Koshar
text: Great, quick service. Usually gets everything right on the money! If you have a problem, just call them right away and they will make it right.

name: Christene Moore
text: Love pizza hit garlic pizza and boneless barbecue chicken. Love the savings and promotional offers and the points earned for free food.

name: Bruce Senter
text: Pizza hut has always been my favorite. The online ordering is really nice. I'm always greeted by a friendly person here. The drive thru is a plus as well. The manager on Sunday is outstanding! He went over and above to correct a small problem. He exemplifies the meaning of a job well done.

name: K. Taylor
text: Have never been inside, just use the pickup window.  Always on time, no issues.  Easy to order online and they usually have specials for better pricing.  Love the toasted parmesan crust.  The rewards program is pretty decent.

name: matthew mcgrath
text:
The hand tossed pizza literally taste like nothing !!!
The bread dough tastes like air mixed with dirt.
And the sauce doesn't fix it. â€¦More

name: chris yeckley
text: Great pizza

name: Andrew Gill
text: For a work place review, it was okay up until I started working with the manager Denine. She was getting involve with my personal life this was just a high school job for me I was working at subway and here she would always keep me after â€¦More

name: Jamie Glenn
text: I just placed an order and one of the pizzas I ordered was a a pepperoni lovers with extra cheese and I literally got a pizza with just extra cheese. I call up there and say something and am literally told I ordered that minus the â€¦More

name: Nick Journey
text: Great delivery driver. Nick is the best. Super quick and funny

name: Sean Kraynak
text: Normally fine.  But todayâ€™s shift manager really has me irritated.  Okay so they forgot my marinara sauce and my ranch dressing for wing and breadsticks ordered with my pasta. So I called to see if they could send some (didnâ€™t have any at â€¦More

name: Ante Curcic
text: I had called about an order I had put in and nobody answered the phone. It put me on hold and it eventually timed out and called them again automatically. I tried calling once more and still nobody answered. Why have a phone line if you dont intend on answering the phone.

name: Mary H
text: The Family Pasta dinner is really good and a great value

name: Chanell Robinson
text: In Mentor only. Max and Joe ðŸ˜‰ other ones nasty

name: Shel
text: I don't often go to Pizza Hut, but was visiting some friends and they insisted on it. We ordered two pizzas, and they accidentally messed one of ours up and it had a huge hole in 2 of the slices or so from it sticking to the oven. They said â€¦More

name: Joseph Hefler IV
text: Guy on the phone at around 7:00 pm on 12/11/17 was very cool. Seemed like he was in a very good mood and even cracked a few jokes. The order was delivered very fast. Delivery driver was very nice and polite. Food was extremely hot upon â€¦More

name: Jeff Page
text: Good pizza!

name: Steven Payne
text: Fast easy drive thru pick ups

name: mslady lady
text: I ordered a pizza and my account was debited, but when I called to check on my order an hour later I was told they have no orders in the system for me. The manger and the workers are rude, cursed at me and was very unprofessional.  I will never spend my money there.

name: kelly ryman
text: This location is terrible. The stuffed crust is a thin cardboard dough. Asked for light sauce and put none on there. Very unappealing. Never asked for a thin crust pizza. Disappointing

name: Diggz Oldie
text: Garbage food an terrible customer service, waited over an hour for 1 pizza an a small thing of soggy cold fries that I threw out immediately. Pizza was greasy an not well done like I ordered an never will I waste money there again.

name: Brian Kelly
text: As far as ordering Pizza this location is awesome. Always courteous and actually strives for customer service...

name: T C
text:
Pizza? GREAT
Customer Service? GREAT â€¦More

name: David Kerr
text: Worst customer service ever. After screwing up one of our pizzas, the woman my wife talked to was very rude. When my wife asked to speak to the manager, he was too busy to take her call. Pray they never screw up your pizza. You'll be treated like garbage.

name: Brian
text: Fast service and the people are friendly.  Also, the pizza is always great.  Never had a bad experience at this location and I order at least once every few weeks.

name: Tonya Schriefer
text: I was having trouble with a coupon not being accepted online. I called the store and spoke with Jason. He was very helpful and made sure I had the coupon added to the order! He saved the work day! Thank you so much!!!!!!!!!!!

name: Greg Nolan
text: Good food at descent prices

name: Maureen Nightingale
text: Ordered light cheese and we'll dobe.  I am thinking they don't know how to listen or they just do the care.. loaded with cheese.. looked more like extra cheese and instead of well done it looked like they took it out a few minutes early.. won't bother calling back.. attention to details is some you learn in grade school .

name: Red Ookami
text: Fast service, always gets my order right.

name: Sandra D. Gwaltney
text: I am so lucky to have this Pizza Hut near me!! Every time I order, they get the order right. The delivery is fast and the food is hot and great!!! If something is ever wrong they fix it right away!!

name: john m
text: They make a good pie for a chain store.

name: Karli McGowan
text:
Ordered online a small order around 7 pm.
It was supposed to be delivered in 50 to 60 minutes. It's been almost 2 hours now and I'm still waiting. Plus, you can't get through to anyone in the store, it â€¦More

name: Proffesional
text: 0 stars if i could, manager denine is incompetent

name: Logan Haiden
text: Ordered delivery around 10ish. Delivery came on time. Driver was blaring music while theres kids and familys trying to sleep and practically every house in my area has dogs. Driver needs to have more hospitality and be more considerate. â€¦More

name: someone else
text: I do not like how any of the new bread tastes. Even paying a dollar more for the original has a horrible taste. I still miss the taco pizza too.

name: Chrissy Hall
text: I've had pizza hut from about half a dozen locations in the area, and this was by far the best pizza hut ive had. We ordered 2 medium any toppings with the special they had for the two of us. Were both picky about pizza, sauce and toppings. â€¦More

name: S
text: Best pizza hut around, great staff and good deals and one of few pizza joints that uses fresh and not canned mushrooms surprisingly..

name: Lisa Heacox
text: It seems the team at this Pizza Hut have really stepped it up the past 6-12 months. Staff are very friendly and helpful (really appreciate that for questions over the phone) and their food is great.

name: Rachelle Davis
text:
Initially rated a 1, however after my pleasant discussion with the district rep who was amazing,
apologetic, respectful, and down right great. Based on him alone I would give a â€¦More

name: lori shelley
text:
I ordered pizza about a month  ago it was doughy. Thought ok it was a mishap.
I ordered wings tonight...$20+tip (cinnamon sticks too)...OMG...this lakeshore store is going down hill!! â€¦More

name: Jason Fuller
text: Ordered food at 9:25 pm,they charged my account and itâ€™s now 11:15 pm and they are closed and still no food. Pizza Hut needs to get it together

name: John Furman
text: Best pizza in willoughby

name: Tyrone Jacobs
text: Fast, polite service, great prices location good, lots of parking spaces

name: Michelle jeckel
text: The employees at this location obviously are not concerned with quality. Served me a raw pizza and when I called for another, they delivered another raw pizza. I could tell just by looking at it that the dough was bad and didn't rise. I â€¦More

name: Dan McCurdy
text: Hot good cheap pizza,  what else can i say

name: Scott Yost
text: Excellent pizza and service! There stuff crust pizza's are the best pizza's out there. Drive up window is great for pick-up's. Make's it easy to grab a pizza on my way home from work. 12bucks and i feed the family.

name: Ashvin & Neha-Soni Patel
text: The quality was one of the worst we've ever had. We ordered whole onion with half double jalapeÃ±os. While 2/3 had jalapeÃ±os on it...they must have realized AFTER  the pizza was done that they forget the double order...so they just threw â€¦More

name: Emily Nash
text: They are always busy, which makes the food super fresh and hot

name: Uno Coltrane
text: Food is always ready and delivered in a timely manner, workers easy to deal with, and I've never had a problem personally with a wrong order or undercooked pizza. I recommend this location.

name: rayvernon
text: Came in Friday the 11th.  Was over charged $10.   They said they cannot credit back the money but would give a $10 store credit. Went in today. They said they can only give $6 off of our purchase.    I have never heard of a store that cannot give a refund

name: Craig Potter
text: Thin n Crispy used to be our go-to pizza. Tonight the pizza was about 1 minute short of being burned and the veggies were shriveled and dried out. Way over-cooked. I might come back in a year or so.

name: John Duka
text: Fast service,  not expensive,  nice employees.

name: Kitty Mom
text: Ordered vegatable pizza, not too bad. ordered bbq wings,asked if they were hot, told no. ordered garlic ones. didn't get wings but got drumetts and the bbq ones were hot,very hot, i couldn't eat them. you couldn't tell if the other were garlic or not. I should have know better, next time its LONGOS. 5 stars for bad.

name: casimer tucholski
text: Love it

name: Scott Soos
text: Fast friendly service

name: Brian Holdridge
text: Ok

name: Stampy MinecraftMan
text: Very poor customer service.

name: Tj Gsomething
text: Don't get delivery.

name: Sally Brewer
text: Fast

name: Melissa Gray
text: No customer service Should not get any stars gave me the wrong pizza

name: Carl Meek
text: Pizza was cold and hardly no toppings that I wanted. They run special and the quality goes down. Will not.be back too many other choices to order from.

name: Mark Douglas Obenour
text: Drive up or walk in. NO PUBLIC RESTROOM! â˜¹ NOT A DINE IN PIZZA HUT!

name: Darko Puselja
text: Loving it

name: Jennifer Dowling
text: Service is horrible!!

name: Melissa Mehling
text: My mom orders 2 pizza from there store last night and took a bit and had a bolt in her pizza.

name: Scott Bennett
text: They p@ssed the buck on me

name: midcasp1
text: Pizza was very good.  Also I like the Pizza Hut drive up window at the Lake shore location in Mentor.  Staff there are always friendly and usually no wait time at all for pizza.  Plus the price is excellent.
